person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: West Indies captain Courtney Walsh elected to bat after winning the toss in the first match in the World Series limited overs competition against Australia at the Melbourne Cricket Ground on Friday .

Let's think step by step.

1. Courtney Walsh (Person, West Indies captain)
2. (unspecified) captain (Person, implied to be Courtney Walsh)
3. Australia (Organization, opposing team)

So, the identified Person entities in the paragraph are:

1. Courtney Walsh
2. (unspecified) captain (implied to be Courtney Walsh)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

1. Courtney Walsh

So, the only identified Person entity in the paragraph is:

1. Courtney Walsh

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
